description: Latest news, judgments, and updates from Bombay High Court

news.title: Bombay High Court Rules on Public Interest Litigation Guidelines
news.content: The Bombay High Court has delivered a significant judgment clarifying the parameters for Public Interest Litigation (PIL) in cases involving environmental protection and social justice. The court emphasized the need for genuine public interest and discouraged frivolous petitions that clog the judicial system.

news.title: Bombay High Court Clarifies Commercial Court Jurisdiction
news.content: The Bombay High Court has provided important clarifications on the jurisdiction of commercial courts in Maharashtra, addressing conflicts between different commercial divisions and establishing clear guidelines for case allocation based on dispute value and geographical considerations.
